text: Gè faa ɠiligaa ɠaaʋɛ mɔnɔ zooi ɠa: Yeenɔpɛ tɛi kpizɛ wo nu wolaiti ta ɗa leʋe da zɔi pɛ ba, gaaɓaa nuiti ti la ɗa ga ziɛ yeenɔpɛ zɔiti bu kɔɔɠɔzuʋɛ. Ɠima nui pɛ tɛi a ɗa ɠɔnɔgi zɔlɔɔ fala, naavoloi la ga keleɠele nuiti gila tɔnɔ, unfemai la nɔ ɓalaa ga faa ɠwɛɛ nu wolaiti gila tɔnɔ. Mazɔlɔɔ ɛsɛ pɛ ná-kpalai ta ná-undaanɛɛi ɠa ɗa zeeli ma.
